attributes.action: Block the exradition process of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gary McKinnon, who is a vunrable person, made a mistake that does not need him to be tried in a different country and face a wholly unjust amount of time in a foreign jail.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.

In a statement today, the Home Secretary has said: "It would be illegal for me to stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon, which the Court ruling has made clear."
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
